overview: Dmitry was an analyst at Interweb LLC, at Talkoclock, Inc. and co-founder of micro online-shop at Beanbagz.ru as a hobby. Now he is a “hired gun”. Friends from Talkoclock: “He wakes up before everyone else does. He often acts as “wake-upper” for our team. Because of this he’s always on top of all the computer-related news before the others. Other team members constantly ask Dmitry for advice as he has a real knack for sorting out what’s important from the huge volume of information he gathers. He’s also skilled at explaining complicated things briefly and simply. With all that useful information stored in his head Dmitry is far superior to modern hard drives.” - almost true)
